property.name: service.pid
property.value: org.avm.hmi.swt.management.Management

property.name: service.bundleLocation
property.value: http://localhost/org.avm.hmi.swt.management.jar

property.name: reboot
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec reboot name=Relancer Syst\u00E8me group=system

property.name: sync
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/management autoupdate name=MAJ via reseau group=system

property.name: syncdata
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/jdb sync\n/management upload -f true -r true name=D\u00E9chargement group=system

property.name: shell
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec /usr/bin/xterm; stop=/management shell exec "sh -c 'killall xterm'" name=Xterm group=system

property.name: twm
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec /usr/bin/twm; stop=/management shell exec "sh -c 'killall twm'" nameZZ=TWM groupZZ=system

property.name: firefox
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec firefox; stop=/management shell exec "sh -c 'killall firefox-bin'" name=Firefox group=system

property.name: killX
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec "sh -c 'killall X'" name=Relancer X group=system

property.name: onescreenv2
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec /etc/sysconfig/xconfig 1 name=Pupitre 6.5''V2 seul group=system

property.name: dualscreenv2
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec /etc/sysconfig/xconfig 2 name=Pupitre 6.5''V2 + TFT group=system

property.name: onescreenv3
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec /etc/sysconfig/xconfig 3 name=Pupitre 6.5''V3 seul group=system

property.name: dualscreenv3
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec /etc/sysconfig/xconfig 4 name=Pupitre 6.5''V3 + TFT group=system

property.name: dualscreen7pouces
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec /etc/sysconfig/xconfig 5 name=Pupitre 7'' seul group=system

property.name: dualscreen7poucesTFT
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec /etc/sysconfig/xconfig 6 name=Pupitre 7'' + TFT group=system

property.name: wifi
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec ifup-wlan -d ath0 stop=/management shell exec ifdown-wlan -d ath0 name=Wifi group=system

property.name: usbupdate
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec "sh -c '/mnt/sda1/avm/update.sh'" name=MAJ via cl\u00E9 USB group=system

property.name: son-long
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/sound configure -n voyageur-interieur\n/variable write -n vioaudio-int 1\n/mp3 play $HOME/data/sound/test-voyageur-continue.mp3 stop=/mp3 stop name=Jiggle group=sound

property.name: son-voyageur
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/vocal testvoyageur name=Test voyageur group=sound

property.name: son-conducteur
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/vocal testconducteur nameZZ=Test conducteur groupZZ=sound

property.name: ango
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/leds setstates 1FF 40 false stop=/leds setstates 0 0 false name=Eco-conduite group=can

property.name: indicator
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/indicator evaluate name=Indicators group=CAN

property.name: can
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/management shell exec "xterm -geometry 80+20+0+0 -e '/sbin/ifconfig can0 | grep bytes && sleep 3'" name=Frame Counters group=CAN

property.name: gps
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/gps showp name=GPS group=test

property.name: ftpserver
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/management shell nmap ftpserver.avm.org 80 name=Acc\u00E8s MAJ group=test

property.name: vncsvr
property.value: #Tue Nov 21 11:52:37 CET 2006 start=/management shell exec "sh -c /root/avm/bin/avmvncserver" stop=/management shell exec "sh -c 'killall avmvncserver'" name=VNC group=system

property.name: saml
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 start=/management shell nmap saml.avm.org 8093 name=Acc\u00E8s Temps R\u00E9el group=test

property.name: config-girouettes
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 MATIS-DH20=matis|comm:1|4800|8|1|even|MATIS MATIS-HE200=matis|comm:1|4800|8|1|even|MATIS MATIS-C10000=matis|comm:1|1200|8|1|even|MATIS SPEC=spec|comm:1|9600|8|1|even|SPEC DUHAMEL-PF5005-PCE300=duhamel|comm:1|1200|7|1|none|PCE3xx DUHAMEL-PF5005-PCE311=duhamel|comm:1|9600|7|1|none|PCE3xx MOBITEC=mobitec|rs485:2|1200|7|2|even|ICU400 HANOVER-(D)ERIC+=hanover|comm:1|9600|8|1|none|GTMH_1,SOCRIE_B AESYS=aesys|comm:1|9600|8|1|none|KC640_32G,KC2S_1,KC2S_2

property.name: config-afficheurs
property.value: #Thu Oct 05 22:12:56 CEST 2006 MOBITEC=mobitec|rs485:0|1200|7|2|even|MOBITEC MATIS=matis|rs485:0|1200|8|1|even|MATIS HANOVER=hanover|rs485:0|4800|8|1|none|GTMH_1,SOCRIE_B AESYS=aesys|rs485:0|9600|8|1|none|AESYS
